name: wp-hotelier-hello-elementor
description: WP Hotelier Integration For Hello Theme.
author: Benito Lopez http://lopezb.com/

scripts.run:pot: rm -rf dist; wp-pot --src '**/*.php' --dest-file languages/wp-hotelier-hello-elementor.pot --domain wp-hotelier-hello-elementor --package 'WP Hotelier - Hello Elementor' --bug-report https://github.com/wp-hotelier/wp-hotelier-hello-elementor --team 'WP Hotelier <support@wphotelier.com>' --write-file
scripts.minify:js: rm -f assets/js/frontend/*.min.js; for f in assets/js/frontend/*.js; do short=${f%.js}; uglifyjs $f > $short.min.js; done
scripts.build:scss: npm run run:sass && npm run run:sass -- -w
scripts.zip: rsync -azP -e --delete --exclude='package.json' --exclude='package-lock.json' --exclude='README.md' --exclude='postcss.config.js' --exclude='.*/' --exclude='.*' --exclude='node_modules/' --exclude='dist/' --exclude='assets/sass/' . dist/wp-hotelier-hello-elementor; cd dist; zip -r wp-hotelier-hello-elementor.$npm_package_version.zip wp-hotelier-hello-elementor; cd ..
scripts.dist: rm -rf dist; mkdir -p dist/wp-hotelier-hello-elementor; npm run zip -s
